name: Daily Hadith Widget
author: nath4n

sections.description:
Hadith widgets for websites

Add daily hadith widget to any website including Joomla, WordPress and Blogger.

Simply cut and paste the provided script (JavaScript) from “http://ahadith.co.uk/dailyhadithwidget.php” to add daily hadith widget (a different hadith daily from Bukhari, Muslim, Muwatta, Abu Dawood and Tirmidhi)

For more information about Hadith widgets for websites please go to “http://ahadith.co.uk/dailyhadithwidget.php”
sections.installation:
1. Upload the files to the /wp-content/plugins/daily-hadith-widget/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘Appearance > Widgets’ and add the widget to your sidebar
